titles.title: Stop Deducting Damages Act of 2010
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to disallow deductions for the payment of punitive damages, and for other purposes.
Stop Deducting Damages Act of 2010

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Stop Deducting Damages Act of 2010 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to: (1) deny a tax deduction for any amount paid or incurred for punitive damages in connection with any judgment in, or settlement of, any legal action; and (2) include any amount paid as punitive damages in gross income for income tax purposes.
